00022 template <bool Flag, class Type1, class Type2>
00023 struct IF
00024 {
00025     typedef Type1 result;
00026 };
00027 
00028 template <class Type1, class Type2>
00029 struct IF<false, Type1, Type2>
00030 {
00031     typedef Type2 result;
00032 };
00033 
00034 
00037 template <bool Flag, unsigned Num1, unsigned Num2>
00038 struct IF_N
00039 {
00040     enum
00041     {
00042         result = Num1
00043     };
00044 };
00045 
00046 template <unsigned Num1, unsigned Num2>
00047 struct IF_N<false, Num1, Num2>
00048 {
00049     enum
00050     {
00051         result = Num2
00052     };
00053 };
00054 
00055 const int DEFAULT = ~(~0u >> 1); // initialize with the smallest int
00056 
00057 struct NilCase {};
00058 
00059 template <int tag_, class Type_, class Next_ = NilCase>
00060 struct CASE
00061 {
00062     enum { tag = tag_ };
00063     typedef Type_ Type;
00064     typedef Next_ Next;
00065 };
00066 
00067 template <int tag, class Case>
00068 class SWITCH
00069 {
00070     typedef typename Case::Next NextCase;
00071     enum
00072     {
00073         caseTag = Case::tag,
00074         found = (caseTag == tag || caseTag == DEFAULT)
00075     };
00076 public:
00077     typedef typename IF < found,
00078     typename Case::Type,
00079     typename SWITCH<tag, NextCase>::result
00080     > ::result result;
00081 };
00082 
00083 template <int tag>
00084 class SWITCH<tag, NilCase>
00085 {
00086 public:
00087     typedef NilCase result;
00088 };
00089 
00090 template <unsigned Input>
00091 class LOG
00092 {
00093 public:
00094     enum
00095     {
00096         value = LOG < Input / 2 > ::value + 1
00097     };
00098 };
00099 
00100 template <>
00101 class LOG < 1 >
00102 {
00103 public:
00104     enum
00105     {
00106         value = 0
00107     };
00108 };
00109 
00110 template <>
00111 class LOG < 0 >
00112 {
00113 public:
00114     enum
00115     {
00116         value = 0
00117     };
00118 };
00119
